name: Supernova
description: Supernova, formerly called “Chronic,” is an indica-dominant hybrid from Amsterdam. Other cuts of Supernova have made their way to the U.S. with more sativa-slanted genetics. When grown properly, Supernova’s THC content reaches up to 25%.
attributes_title: Happy, Relaxed, Uplifted, Euphoric, Creative, Pain, Insomnia, Stress, Depression, Headaches, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Headache, Dizzy
